13.14 APRIL 2017

Journey 2017

The Ultimate Customer Support Experience Event
REGISTER NOW
INSPIRE . CREATE . REPEAT
The online summit for the customer obsessed

Journey is an online summit for businesses that believe building an organization that's focused on mastering the customer experience.Throug elite speakers, and for a community of customer focused advocating superheroes, Journey is the global event for networking, learning and career development in effortless customer experiences.
